title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 20th: Tough Trade Talk With China And Canada, Russia Retaliation
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Today's top stories: The IMF and World Bank commence their spring meetings in Washington, D.C.; the Treasury Department may move to block Chinese investment in sensitive technologies; and ahead of the recent Southwest Airlines plane crash this week the company clashed with GE over aircraft inspections.
